humanum_full_description_en:
From " force ", "雚" sound. The original meaning is to encourage and encourage. "Said Wen": "Persuade, encourage. Congli, Yu Sheng." Such as "Shang Shu. "Da Yumo": "Quiet is to use Xiu, Dong Zhi uses prestige, to persuade him to use nine songs, so as not to be bad." Kong Yingdashu: "Persuade the emperor to make the emperor good." "Mandarin. "Vietnamese": "For fruitful actions, all people in the country persuade, the father encourages his son, the brother encourages his younger brother, and the wife encourages his husband." "Xunzi" has an "Encouraging Learning" chapter to encourage people to study hard.

" Persuade " also means being encouraged. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "And the world is praised without persuasion, the world without it without being discouraged." "Han Feizi. "Xianxue": "If you have merit, you must reward, then you will be richer and more persuade."

" Persuade " means to persuade and persuade. "Guang Ya. Interpretation IV": "Persuade, teach." Such as "Historical Records. Benji of Gaozu: "Asian father persuades Xiang Yu to attack Pei Gong." "Han Shu. "Wei Xian Biography": "Zhou Gong is the precept of "Wu Yi", and three Yin sects are used to persuade him to become a king."

" Persuade " means hard work and diligence. Such as "Pipe. Light and Heavy B": "If it is, then the fields will be opened up, and the farmer persuades them to proceed." "Zhuangzi. "Xu Wugui": "If the common people have a career in the past, persuade them, and if a hundred workers have equipment, they will be strong."

" Persuading " also means powerful. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Song Wei Ce": "Qi attacked the Song Dynasty, and the Song ambassador Zangzi asked Yu Jing for help. King Jing said that Xu Jiu was very persuasive." Gao You's note: "Persuasion, strength."

humanum_full_description:
從「力」，「雚」聲。本義是勉勵、鼓勵。《說文》：「勸，勉也。从力，雚聲。」如《尚書．大禹謨》：「戒之用休，董之用威，勸之以九歌，俾勿壞。」孔穎達疏：「勸帝使長為善也。」《國語．越語》：「果行，國人皆勸，父勉其子，兄勉其弟，婦勉其夫。」《荀子》有〈勸學〉篇，鼓勵人要努力學習。

　　「勸」也表示受到鼓勵。如《莊子．逍遙遊》：「且舉世而譽之而不加勸，舉世而非之而不加沮。」《韓非子．顯學》：「夫有功者必賞，則爵祿厚而愈勸。」

　　「勸」表示勸導、勸說。《廣雅．釋詁四》：「勸，教也。」如《史記．高祖本紀》：「亞父勸項羽擊沛公。」《漢書．韋賢傳》：「周公為〈毋逸〉之戒，舉殷三宗以勸成王。」

　　「勸」表示努力、勤勉。如《管子．輕重乙》：「若是則田野大辟，而農夫勸其事矣。」《莊子．徐無鬼》：「庶人有旦暮之業則勸，百工有器械之巧則壯。」

　　「勸」還表示有力。如《戰國策．宋衛策》：「齊攻宋，宋使臧子索救於荊。荊王大說，許救甚勸。」高誘注：「勸，力也。」
